name: Ancano

aspects.high_concept: Thalmor Advisor Embedded in the College
aspects.trouble: Obsessed with the Eye of Magnus

stunts: Thalmor Training: +2 to Will when resisting magical effects
Diplomatic Immunity: Can invoke political protection to avoid consequences

relationships.Elenwen: Superior and handler at the Thalmor Embassy
relationships.Savos Aren: Arch-Mage forced to tolerate his presence

personality_notes.speaking_style: Condescending and formal, treats non-Altmer as inferior
motivations: Secure the Eye of Magnus for the Thalmor
fears: Being expelled before completing his mission

scene_triggers: Final confrontation in Hall of the Elements
